title: Banished
description: All she needed was time to forget.‘Come with me,’ he said and she went.‘You need to leave,’ he said and she left.Now Grace needs to rediscover herself: the person she lost in Donato’s arms, the person remoulded by his passion… the person who was all the poorer for never having known him.But, there is more to the tale than a simple abandoned love affair.Much more… and Grace is the key.
author: Bea Turvey
